DOC.brief_summary: The goal research determine efficacy safety Traditional Chinese Acupuncture ( TCA ) patient osteoarthritis knee . A three arm randomize control trial ( RCT ) use sham TCA , true TCA , education/attention comparison group total sample 525 propose . Primary hypothesis test patient randomize true TCA significantly improvement pain function measure Womac Pain & Function Scales patient global assessment patient randomize sham acupuncture education/attention control group . Secondary aim study 1 ) determine improvement TCA differ patient age 65 vs. age 65 , 2 ) determine improvement TCA differ racial/ethnic group ( ie. , Caucasian , Black , Hispanic ) , 3 ) determine improvement TCA differs stage radiographic severity knee OA baseline ( KL grade 2 , 3 4 )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis osteoarthritis knee ( fulfil ACR criterion ) least 6 month duration At least moderate pain knee day last month Must take analgesic nonsteroidal antiinflammatory agent control pain Documented radiographic change osteoarthritis ( KellgrenLawrence grade > 2 ) time rheumatological screening Signed informed consent
